title: Personalized Mathematics Learning Support Strategies Using AI Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of college-level foundational mathematics concepts (functions, calculus, statistics, etc.)
context.additional_context: Learners interact with an AI chatbot via an online platform to self-directively improve problem-solving skills. The chatbot provides real-time feedback and recommends personalized content based on individual learning pattern analysis

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 80% or more of their weekly math problem-solving processes through interaction with an AI chatbot.
Learners identify and create improvement plans for at least three personal weak areas using customized practice problems recommended by a chatbot.
Learners achieve an average performance improvement of 20% or more by incorporating chatbot feedback in formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
